result.name: crayfish-control-crayfish-trapping-records-from-six-sites-in-england-from-2013-to-2015
result.notes:
Records of crayfish caught in Crayfish traps at six sites across England from 
October 2013 to November 2015, including counts and site details.

organization.name: marine-environmental-data-information-network
organization.title: Marine Environmental Data & Information Network
organization.description: MEDIN is a partnership of UK organisations committed to improving access to marine data. Our partners are both public and private sector.

resources.description: The Cefas Data Portal contains metadata records and data sets available to download and connect to in support of our commitment to open science. Data is available in the following formats: Binary download, CSV.
